mapper.select: SELECT wsa.sop_push_time_id, wspt.push_start_time, wspt.push_end_time, wspt.push_time_pre, wspt.push_time_type, wsa.id as sop_attachment_id FROM we_sop_push_time wspt INNER JOIN we_sop_attachments wsa ON wspt.id = wsa.sop_push_time_id WHERE wspt.del_flag=0 AND wsa.del_flag=0 AND wspt.sop_base_id=#{sopBaseId}
